array.string: 欢迎您来到 Little AI
您可以使用屏幕下方的按钮控制一个叫“Little AI”的可爱机器人。过关的条件是在10个回合之内夺得10分。
在您玩的过程当中，您可以看到生成的称之为“交互”的彩色圆圈和方框。您的得分是最近的10次交互结果的总和。对的，只是最近的10次交互！
在您获得10分之后，您会看到重播模式，您将会更好的理解交互的含义。
交互是一系列的命令及其相应的反馈信息。这些命令会通过他们的形状的不同而区别开来，反馈的信息通过他们的颜色区别开来。交互流称之为“迹”。
为了更好的了解这个游戏，比较推荐按照以下的顺序来进行，1、首先阅读使用说明。2，过关。3、分析重现模式。
拖动二维的机器人到左边或者右边来改变之前或者之后的级别
Little AI发现了交互或多或少的喜悦或者不开心。与这些交互相关联点表明了这些感受的强度。
产生了喜悦的交互的模式
在一条迹上敲击交互来重播之前的命令。相同的命令发生在相同的物体上产生相同的交互。为了重播全部的交互的模式，可以通过敲击“下一个命令”数次（在敲击一个交互的时候白色的形状在左边产生）
按压或者保持一个命令来改变他的形状。按压或者保持一个交互在一个迹里面来改变他的颜色。
改变命令的形状和交互的颜色来识别他们。形状和颜色只是用来描述的，他们不会改变或者影响机器人。
您也可以通过你的小机器人发出的哭声来识别交互。在这个游戏里面，你的耳朵同样也可以帮助你很多。
在第4级别中，Little AI 不会总是避开不开心的交互。
产生出一个交互的模式，这个模式里面包含了尽量少的不开心的交互。
为命令使用不同的形状。用绿色显示了开心的交互，用红色显示了不开心的交互。不要想太多，您的大脑将会在你知晓之前看到模式！
每一条命令的实验会联系的执行多次。在一个迹中，您将会看到一个命令总是在给定的情形中产生相同的交互（比如相同的形状和相同的颜色）。
这个命令允许在不改变他的情况下观察他。我们称之为“观测命令”，以及他的交互结果“观测交互”。
使用观测交互的颜色来避开在下一个循环中表现出的强烈的不高兴交互
在第6级别中，命令有着与第5级别相同的影响和作用，但是他们被按照随机的顺序重新排列，并且都最初的用圆圈来表现出来。
剩下的留给你去将 形状归属于命令，将颜色归属于交互。
以绿色展示出的交互式欢快的。或者在下一轮中先兆的给出欢快的交互，红色的是在下一轮中强烈的不快或者是其先兆的相互交互
In Level 7, the commands have the same effects as in Levels 5 and 6, but the values of interactions are different.
Tap the interactions in the trace to replay enjoyable patterns of interaction in the context when it is possible.
When you replay a pattern, skip the observational commands to maximize your score.
On Level 8, the commands have the same effects as in Levels 5 to 7.
Now, however, one of the commands always yields the same interaction. This is a "non-informative command".
Although non-informative commands always yield the same interaction, do not mistake them for observational commands.
The commands have similar effects as in the previous levels, but they also transform the environment on the long term.
Little AI must transform its environment until it can enact an enjoyable interaction on every turn.
Level 10's world is the same as Level 9's.
Let's see if you can tell the observational command and the non-informative command apart.
In Level 11, Little AI can move forward and turn in a little box.
It loves moving forward but hates bumping into the edges of the box.
The box is even smaller.
Scroll to review the last 100 interactions. Double-tap on an empty area to scroll back to origin.
Press the score to see your number of turns.
Level 13 offers the same commands as Levels 11 and 12 plus an observational command.
Now Little AI really hates bumping, and quite dislikes turning. Fortunately, the box is getting bigger!
Use the observational command to avoid bumping into the edges.
Level 14's world is the same as Level 13's.

As a player, you are in an analogous situation as a newborn baby that ignores the signification of its gestures and of its senses, or of a robot that ignores the signification of its actuators and sensors.
You must learn to know yourself and your environment to live a happy life!
Little AI now has two additional observational commands that it can use to observe the edges of the box on its right and on its left.
Use these additional possibilities of observation to avoid turning towards the edges of the box.
The box is getting even bigger.
You are in the same world as in Level 15 with the same commands initially uninterpreted.
Little AI is a free open-source research and pedagogical project driven by enthusiast volunteers in collaboration with academia.
If you wish to learn more about research in developmental artificial intelligence and about us, consider visiting http://little-ai.com.
You reached the last level of series #0! Congratulations! It is similar to Level 16.
If you found Little AI enjoyable or instructive, or both, please consider making a small donation.
Your donations will support the creation of new levels. It will also promote independent and open-source research in developmental artificial intelligence.
